# Resources

## Zoom

---

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-6">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/zoom.jpg"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-6">
Zoom is a video conferencing platform that allows for both one-on-one and group meetings. During Prospective Student Days, you will use it for most of your meetings.

Keep in mind that while the Zoom links for all common meetings are located on the [Schedule](/schedule) page, links to your individual meetings with faculty can be found in the email we sent you with your personal schedule.
</div>
</div>

## Kumospace

---

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-6">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/kumospace.jpg"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-6">
Kumospace is an immersive video chat platform that allows people to mingle within a virtual event space. During Prospective Student Days, our social events will take place on Kumospace at [this link](https://www.kumospace.com/prospectives){target="_blank"}.
</div>
</div>

## Slack

---

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-6">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/slack.jpg"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-6">
Slack is a digital messaging platform that allows for text-based conversations. During Prospective Student Days, graduate students will be available on [this dedicated Slack Channel](https://www.slack.com){target="_blank"}.

We welcome you to stop by anytime throughout your virtual visit! We would be happy to to help you find where you need to go next, answer questions about the program, discuss life in New York City, or chat about your research interests.
</div>
</div>
